about.description: Passionate software engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications and distributed systems. I love solving complex problems with clean, efficient code and have a particular interest in performance optimization and system design.
about.additional: When I'm not coding, you can find me contributing to open source projects, mentoring junior developers, or exploring the latest in cloud technologies.

projects.title: CloudSync Dashboard
projects.description: A real-time analytics dashboard for monitoring distributed cloud services. Features include live data visualization, custom alerting, and automated scaling recommendations. Handles 10M+ events per day with sub-second latency.

projects.title: Neural Code Assistant
projects.description: An AI-powered code completion and review tool that integrates with popular IDEs. Uses transformer architecture to provide context-aware suggestions and identifies potential bugs. Trained on 50M+ lines of open source code.

projects.title: GameStream Platform
projects.technologies: Go ‚Ä¢ WebRTC ‚Ä¢ Kubernetes ‚Ä¢ Redis ‚Ä¢ React Native
projects.description: Low-latency game streaming platform supporting 1080p@60fps with adaptive bitrate. Built custom WebRTC implementation and edge computing infrastructure. Scales to 100K+ concurrent users across multiple regions.

projects.title: Open Source Contributions
projects.description: Active contributor to major open source projects including React Router, Kubernetes, and TensorFlow. Maintained several popular npm packages with 500K+ downloads. Regular speaker at tech conferences and meetups.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
